Parameters: B: The transient bottom bar which has been dismissed.

int: The event which caused the dismissal. One of either: @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar#BaseCallback#DISMISS_EVENT_SWIPE_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar#BaseCallback#DISMISS_EVENT_ACTION_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar#BaseCallback#DISMISS_EVENT_TIMEOUT_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar#BaseCallback#DISMISS_EVENT_MANUAL_E@ or @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar#BaseCallback#DISMISS_EVENT_CONSECUTIVE_E@.
onDismissed(B, int).Description: Called when the given @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar_E@ has been dismissed, either through a time-out, having been manually dismissed, or an action being clicked.

Parameters: B: The transient bottom bar which is now visible.
onShown(B).Description: Called when the given @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar_E@ is visible.
